projects.name: Crowfunding app
projects.description: Created a crowdfunding platform for a startup using MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js). Designed user-friendly interfaces with React.js for an exceptional user experience. Managed server development using Node.js and Express.js. Successfully implemented user authentication, resulting in enhanced platform security and user trust.

projects.name: To-Do App
projects.description: This user-friendly platform offers seamless task management with real-time updates User can effortlessly create, edit, and delete tasks Real-time synchronization ensures tasks are always up-to-date The responsive design ensures a consistent experience on any device. Categorize tasks into various categories

experiences.description: During my internship as a Full Stack Developer, I had the invaluable opportunity to work on an exciting project aimed at creating a cutting-edge crowdfunding website using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js). The project, catering specifically to startups seeking funding for their innovative ventures, was a fantastic learning experience.
During my internship, I contributed to the development of a website using Reactjs for the purpose of facilitating food ordering.
